errors.noResponse: Failed to fetch data: No response
errors.serverSlow: Server response is slow, please try again later. If the problem persists, please refresh the page.

noRelatedPostDesc: Be the first to create content with this character!

ranking.weeklyRulesContent:
Ranked by total likes over the past week. Leaderboard locks at 12:00 AM PST every Monday, with badges and Zaps rewards distributed at 5:00 AM.
1st Place: 500 Zaps | 2nd Place: 300 Zaps | 3rd Place: 100 Zaps
Eligible for both weekly and monthly rewards.
ranking.monthlyRulesContent:
Ranked by total likes over the past month. Leaderboard locks at 12:00 AM PST on the 1st of each month, with badges and Zaps rewards distributed at 5:00 AM.
1st Place: 1,000 Zaps | 2nd Place: 800 Zaps | 3rd Place: 500 Zaps
Eligible for both weekly and monthly rewards.

tagOrder.title: Manage Tags
tagOrder.description: Drag and drop to reorder your followed tags
tagOrder.noFollowedTags: No followed tags yet. Follow some tags to customize their order!
